inn1.comm: slightly short of a length on leg stump and Tharanga tucks it away easily
short of a length on off stump this time and Jayasuriya gets on the backfoot, plays it soft hands and contemplates a single, turned down
fuller in length and left alone safely to the keeper
Munaf sticking to a fuller length this time, Jayasuriya gets across on the front foot and the ball trickles to the leg side
played and missed! pitched up outide off and Jayasuriya pokes at it, the away movement saves him
drifting down the leg side, Munaf errs in line
good length ball outside off stump, Jayasuriya cuts, the ball races to point and a misfield allows a single
short of a length on the batsman's body, not a very pacy delivery, allows Tharanga to tuck  it away
short and srifting outside off stump, Tharanga gets across and cuts to point
better length, closer to the off stump and Tharanga waits on it and dabs it to third man
good ball! short of a length on off stump, the ball starightened after pitching, Tharanga was squared up on the backfoot
Sreesanth errs in line and drifts down leg, Tharanga tucks it away and finds the gap at fine leg
good length delivery on off stump, defended back
what a shot! Munaf bowls wide outside off, gives Jayasuriya width and he plays his trademark slash over the deep point  boundary
Munaf bowls this a fraction fuller and Jayasuriya defends to the on side on the front foot
what a comeback! Munaf drops this one on a good length outiside off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and gets a thick edge to Dhoni
good length delivery on off stump, Atapattu watches it closely and defends on the front foot
similar length, slight away movement and the allows Atapattu to steer it down to third man
fullish delivery, pushed to cover
a teaser from Sreesanth! pitched short of a length outside off and Atapattu was caught unaware of the away seam movement, lucky not to get an edge
pitched on middle and leg, pushed towards the on-side
Sreesanth drops this one fuller outside off, Atatpattu opens the face and steers it to point, a bit of hesitation in the running
good length outside off stump and well left by Tharanga
similar delivery, draws Tharanga on the front-foot  and he pushes it to mid-off
short and wide, Tharanga gets in position to despatch it past covers but gets the placement wrong, straight to the fielder
confident appeal but turned down! Munaf pitches it up on the pads, Atapattu gets forward, the ball appears to be striking leg stump but the umpire Shastri wasn;t convinced
short outside off, not much room to cut, hit straight to point
fuller on off stump, Tharanga punches it slightly wide of mid-off, misfield by Dravid and a run taken
nearly carried back to the bowler, Tharanga plays it in the air
good delivery outside off, Tharanga fiddles with it
played with more confidence this time, fuller outside off stump, Tharanga gets the bat nicely behind it and the ball races to the right of mid-off
opportunity to drive past cover but Atapattu fails to play if off the full face
good length on middle stump, Atapattu fends to the on-side, thinks of a single and sends Tharanga back
finds the gap! overpitched, Atapattu times it well and drives to the left of mid-off
short of a length outside off, Atapattu dabs it down and takes off, collides with Sreesanth on the way
now Sreesanth strikes! pitched up slightly outside the off stump, Tharanga loses his concentration, pokes at it and the ball carries to Tendulkar at first slip at a comfortable height
Sreesanth holds the length back, pitches on middle and leg, Sangakkara defends to the on-side
nearly another! Munaf brings Atapattu forward, tries to drive, there seemed to be a noise and a deviation, confident appeal
drifting towards the body, turned to the on-side for a single,
good length outside off, well bowled and well left
just a fraction fuller, Sangakkara gets his bat down and defends back to the bowler
similar delivery on middle stump, Sangakkara gets the bat behind it and defends back to the bowler
a little streaky, Sangakkara doesnt get his bat behind it well, the ball races past the slips towards the third-man boundary, Harbhajan can;t cut that off
played to the off side, quick single taken
pushed to mid-off
fullish outside off stump, Sangakkara gets forward and safely defends it on the off-side
fullish outside off, Sangakkara gets his balance right and punches it stylishly off the back-foot past cover who dives in vain
holds the length back at a lively pace, Sangakkara decides against playing at it
Munaf gets his radar wrong, full and wide outside off
now he oversteps. better line, Atapattu gets forward and defends towards mid-off
good length on the pads, Atapattu turns his wrists and flicks wide of midwicket for a comfortable two
pitched up outside off, seaming away, Atapattu gets his bat and body behind it and pushes it to the off side
holds the length back, Atapattu tries to cut, doesnt get enough room, the steep bounce saves him
played and missed again! this time on the front foot, clever variation by Munaf
good length on middle stump, Atapattu turns it to the on side but doesnt find  the gap
good length on off stump, defended with soft hands towards the off-side
classis timing! short of a  length outside off, Sangakkara gets on the back-foot and leans onto a languid drive, both mid-off and cover can only watch the ball race between them
pitched closer to the batsman, defended
pitched on middle and leg stump, defended back to the bowler, Sreesanth charges towards the ball, Sangakkara safely in
drifting on the pads, Sangakkara turns his wrists but finds Harbhajan at square leg, seemed like a boundary opportunity
pitched on leg and middle stump, moves away just a touch, defended back
slower one on middle and off stump, Sangakkara tries to cut, feet planted at the crease, ball gets the inner half of the bat and rolls back to the bowler
full and slashed past point, Karthik stretches himself to pull off a blinder, no chance!
brings it cloer to the batsman, defended back
good length outside off, angling away from the right-hander, left alone safely

trapped and no escape this time! Munaf bowls that nagging stump-to-stump line, full on middle, ball straightens after pitching, strikes the front pad, in the path of middle and leg, no doubt for umpire Shastri
pitched up outside off stump, defended back to the bowler
overpitched on off stump but played back to  the bowler
fullish outside off stump, driven to cover
back of a length on off and midle stump, defended back to the bowler
slower delivery, good variation, pitches on middle and off, pushed towards mid-on across the line
holds the length back a little, Sangakkara gets on the back-foot and steers it to point
short and steep! Sreesanth digs it in and Sangakkara moves away and lets it go
good length on off and middle, makes him play this time
sticks to that nagging off stump line, Jayawardene lets it go safely
similar length, comes in just a tad after pitching, makes him play, defended back to the bowler
good length on middle and off, turned to the on-side
Munaf errs in length and jayawardene makes him pay, down leg and the batsman flicks it to the vacant fine-leg region
played and missed! pitches on the corridor outside off, Jayawardene just has to play at it
fuller and close to the pads, hits him on the pads, confident appeal turned down, the height saved him
Sreesanth maintaininmg his shorter length, left alone on the back-foot

caught on the rebound! pitches on a good length outside off stump, Jayawardene fiddles with it, the edge goes to Ganguly at second slip at waist height, he fumbles and Dhoni is alert enough to catch it on the rebound
a litt;le wide outside off stump, left alone
good length just outside off stump, Dilshan gets on the front-foot and defends
plenty of width outside off stump, Dilshan is not interested
fuller, better line, tempting Dilshan to play at it but he lets it go
holds the length back, sticks to the line outside off stump, Dilshan takes the cautious approach and leaves it to the 'keeper
loosener to start off with and despatched on the backfoot past point
similar delivery, Sangakkara can;t find the gap this time
better line, closer to the bat, Sangakkara watchfully lets it go
pitched outside leg, the ball clips the pad and trickles towards the on-side, quick single taken
pitched on the channel outside off, seaming away, left alone safely
good length, slightly wide, tries to cut but doesnt time it well enough, straight to point
short of  alength ball on middle and off, Sangakkara gets on the back foot and pushes back to the bowler
excellent line and length but a no-ball, that pitched on off stump and angled away from Sangakkara who lets it go, very close to off stump that was, a well-judged leave from the batsman
fuller length on middle and leg witha  hint of inswing into the left-hander, Sangakkara closes the face and plays it to mid-on
superb shot and Sehwag does well at cover to save the boundary, Sangakkara leant forward and drove hard, Sehwag dived to his left and saved three runs
left alone outside off stimp, Dilshan watches one that bounced off a good length go through to Dhoni
good length and in the teasing channel outside off stump, Dilshan gets his front foot forward but tucks his bat behind the pad and lets it go through to the wicketkeeper

a fraction short but definitely not short enough to pull, Dilshan was hurried into the stroke and got hit on the body, the ball nearly trolled back on to his stumps but he stopped it with his bat in the nick of time
Ganguly bowls it short and you just can't do that at his pace, Sangakkara has plenty of time to rock back - have a cup of tea - and pull it over the midwicket fence
defended back past the bowler on the front foot, Sangakkara wanted the single but Dilshan wasn't looking at his partner
much fuller in length on middle and off stump, Sangakkara waits on the back foot and defends it late back to Ganguly
good length ball hitting the middle stump line and slanting away from Sangakkara who decides not to play at it

wonderful timing, slightly uppish but he picked the gap, Sangakkara drove at one outside the off stump and checked his shot, the ball felw in the air but through covers, the timing was good enough to keep Uthappa interested in the chase but the ball reache dthe fence in spite of a despairing dive
better length outside the off stump, left alone, 10 runs off that over
Sreesanth bowls another short one and Dilshan once again misses the pull shot, he hasn't found his timing as yet
good length and the ball swings away from the right-hander after pitching just outside off stump, Dilshan lets it go
Sreesanth releases the pressure by bowling a half-volley outside off stump, Dilshan frees his arms and crashes it in front of point for four, he controlled that shot superbly
good length ball on off stump, defended to covers on the front foot
another freebie for the batsman but Sreesanth escapes punishment, that was another half-volley outside off stump, Dilshan unleashes a fierce drive but hits it straight to Harbhajan at cover
short of a length on middle and leg, Dilshan tucks it behind square with the intent of running two, Anil Kumble tries to prevent the second but fails, smart running against a slow fielder
tossed up on off stump, Sangakkara watches it through to Dhoni, not much spin first up
Sangakka steps down the pitch, trying to alter the length, he ends up inside-edging it to midwicket
full length ball on off stump, pushed wide of the fielder at cover for a single
dabbed into the covers for another quick single
tossed up outside off stump and shapes away from the left-hander, Sangakkara lets it go
bowled slightly shorter and quicker outside off stump, Sangakkara goes on the back foot and punches down the ground for a single
good length ball on middle and off stump, defended on the back foor back to the bowler
middle and leg stump line on this occasion, Sangakkara plays it off the back foot to midwicket
dropped short and this time Dilshan connects with pull shot, he slammed that in front of midwicket with a lot of power

two in two, this time thanks to a mis-field, Dilshan square drove a full ball hard at Karthik at point, Karthik took his eyes off the ball as it bounced before him and let it straight through to the fence, poor stuff from an otherwise sharp fielder
hits a good length outside off stump, Dilshan lets it go
good length ball to end his spell, Dilshan gets forward and defends to cover.
flighted delivery looping into Sangakkara's off stump, the drift draws him forward and he defends to cover
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
floated through the air on off stump, Sangakkara opens the face and plays it to gully

three dot balls and a four off the fourth! Sangakkara steps down the track and Harbhajan slips on to middle and leg, Sangakkara uses the angle to turn it fine, he's timed that well enough to reach the fence
fuller ball outside off stump, left alone through to Dhoni
flatter ball to end the over, Sangakkara plays on the back foot and defends to midwicket
starts off witha  short ball on off stump, Dilshan makes room and cuts to third man where Munaf Patel makes a hash of a easy take
terribly short again, on middle and off stump, Dilshan dispatches it over midwicket with a powerful pull short
defended on the off side
fuller length on off stump, Dilshan pushes hard at it on the front foot and gets an inside edge that runs fine on the leg side, seven runs already off this over
good length ball on off stump, driven back to the bowler on the back foot
dropped too short yet again, Sangakkara waits on the back foor and punches to long on for a single
tight line and length, angling into the off stump fron round the wicket, Sangakkara gets forward and defends
the line is outside off stump this time and Sangakkara lets it go
drifting on to middle and leg stump, Sangakkara turns it off his pads for a single behind square on the leg side
tossed up nicely on off and middle stump, Dilshan takes a step down and yorks himself, played back to the bowler
that's the 50 partnership, Dilshan pushes to covers on the front foot for a single, they've scored 50 off 58 balls, excellent effort after a terrible start
left alone outside the off stump, Harbhajan is controlling his line well, having to bowl at both a right and left hander
defended to cover on the front foot
skiddy delivery on off and middle, Dilshan gets forward and defends back to the bowler
fired into middle and leg stump, Dilshan takes a step or two down and find that he is in no position to play any stroke, he ends up playing it inside-out back to Kumble
defended on the front foot on the off side
driven to deep covers for a single, first runs off the over
tossed up on off and middle stump, Sangakkara drives firmly down to long off for another single
flighted through on off stump, Sangakkara gets forward with bat close to pad and defends to cover
played with soft hands in front of midwicket for a sharp single
dropped a fraction short and Dilshan didn't pick the doosra that bounced a lot more, he was comprehensively beaten outside the off stump
too full and too straight, Dilshan gets down on one knee and whacks it square, he's placed that in front of deep midwicket and wide of fine leg, four more
defended  to point on the back foot
fuller and faster on middle stump, Dilshan works it off his toes for a single to midwicket
bowled quick through the air on middle and off, Dilshan uses his feet, comes forward and drives to long off
Sangakkara this time leans forward and pushes to long-on for another single, it's looking very easy for Sri Lanka at the moment
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Dilshan once more steps down the pitch to use the full length to drive to long off
Kumble bowls the googly but Sangakkara picks it and decides not to play at it
another googly to end the over, Sangakkara drives firmly but straight back to the bowler
flighted delivery on middle and leg stump, tucked away behind square leg for a single
floated through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
slanting into middle and leg stump, Sangakkara moves across and pushes in front of midwicket for a single
bowled on a good length on off and middle and that was quicker from Harbhajan, defended on the front foot
this outfield is like super greased lightning, Dilshan pushed at that on the front foot and got an outside edge, it was the doosra but with no slip in palce that sped to the bowler
turned off the pads for more runs behind square on the leg side
fullish ball outside off stump, Sangakkara leans forward and drives firmly through cover
too straight from Kumble and Sangakkara glances it to fine leg
Dilshan is uses his feet nicely to the spinners, he steps down the pitch and drives to long-on
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
tight line and length on off stump, Sangakkara gets forward and defends it to the leg side
cut to point on the back foot, only two runs off that over
defended on the leg side
swept down to long leg for another single

outstanding shot, that was bowled on a good length and Sangakkara initially moved forward and then transferred his weight on the back foot to punch through covers, superb timing and there was no stopping that
defended on the back foot
played back to the bowler on the front foot with bat and pad close together
fullish length on off stump, Sangakkara drives through covers and retains strike
full ball on leg and middle, Sangakkara moves across and tries to flick, he gets hit on the pad for leg byes to fine leg
Dilshan tries to force it through the off side but hits it straight to point
played behind square on the leg side for a leg bye
good length and line on off stump, Sangakkara pushes to cover on the front foot
defended back to Kumble on the back foot, tight stuff from Kumble
fuller ball on off and middle, played to square leg, just the two leg byes off the over
bit of width given and puncjed off the back-foot towards deep cover
flatter outside off, the leg break, Sangakkara gets on his knees and sweeps with the turn
pushed in a little faster outside off, driven to cover
slightly shoort on off stump, steered t0 point
full toss on off stump, too much flight, swept to deep midwicket
tossed up on off stump, wais for it, nicely steered by Dilshan to point
flat trajectory on middle, played back to the bowler
fullish and Dilshan steps dowm gets to the pitch of it and drives towards mid-on
short of a length outside off and cut away, not a very bad ball but Sangakkara must be credited for that boundary for hus quick use of feet
drifting down leg, sewpt to fine leg
fuller, struck on the pad but he was well forward, half hearted appeal from Dhoni
fullish on off stump, driven through the line towards long-off
drifting on leg, tucked away towards the leg side
short of a length and fired outside off, cut away straight to point
tossed up this time and driven comfortably towards long off
flatter this time and steered towards point
Tendulkar bowls a fuller length and Sangakkara tries to nudge it past the gap between point and cover
this on comes in after pitching, quick single taken and the batsman is home before the direct hit at the non-strikers end
drifted in towards off stump at a slow pace, dabbed towards third man
delicate! Kumble errs towards the pads, Dilshan waits on it and just flicks it with ease
cut towards point and brilliantly saved by Karthik, saved four for sure
flighted on leg stump, gently pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
flatter and a little faster, Dilshan adjusts his weight on the front foot and turns it to the on-side and races back for a second run
flighted outdide off and defended to the bowler
flatter and faster outside off, punshed to the off side off the back-foot
defended towards the off side
short of a length, Sangakkara drops it with soft hands on the off side and shoots off for a quick single
pushed back to the bowler
that one was fired in around off stump, Dilshan made room to cut and nearly pierced the gap past point, solid save by Karthik again
tossed up on off stump, Dilshan works it with the turn on the on-side, the fielder fires the retun to the bowler eho takes the bails off, appeal ensues, third umpire called in and he was well in
tossed up at a slow pace, Sangakkara gets down to sweep but plays a little too early, ball clips the pad and rolls to the off side

foxed by the doosra! pitches on the perfect length on off stump, straightens, Dilshan was clearly not expecting that, barely has time to play a stroke, the ball clips the top of off stump, Dilshan looks stunned
tossed on off and middle, defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
pushed towards the on side
slower ball,  tossed up around off, Arnold waits on it, opens the face of the bat and nudges towards short third man region for a quick single
Tendulkar fires that one in around off  stump, cramps him for room, played back to the bowler
sharp single, pushed to the off side
slower this time, pushed to the off side, single turned down
flighted on leg, Sangakkara pushes it with the turn to long-on
defended back the bowler off the front foot
fullish and Sangakkara stretches forward and takes it on the full, turns his wrists and steers it towards the on-side
tossed up outside off stump, turns away, left alone
pushed with the turn to mid-on, Ganguly does really well to cut that off sliding to his right
swept fine but finds the fielder
tossed up on middle and leg, no turn, strikes him on the pad, stifled appeal
tossed up on off  stump, tries to work it away to the off side
similar delivery, gets across and plays it back to the bowler
tossed up on leg, worked away to the on-side, good effort by Uthappa
sweeps and sweeps fine, Harbhajan fields at fine leg
faster outside off and played back to the bowler
short and width offered, Sangakkara gets across and slams it past point, he was rewarded for his elegent footwork on that occassion
keeps it within the stumps this time, Sangakkara plays it back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, fullish, Arnold tries to steer it to the on side and plays it to short fine-leg
fullish and worked away towards square leg
good length on middle, Sangakkara gets forward and places it in the vacant area towards square
faster delivery, pushed towards mid-on
attempted sweep, gets the top-edge and the ball heads towards fine leg, Tnedulkar just manages to stop it with his foot
not much loop this time, swept square for an easy single
short ball down leg side, Sangakkara tries to pull but misses, wide called
driven to long on for a single
defended back to the bowler on the front foot

Sachin strikes! That pitched on leg stump and went straight through, Arnold tries to close the face and play it through midwicket, he misses and the ball his him dead centre in front of middle stump, the umpire took his time but eventually raised the finger
bowled quick and flat on off and middle, defended on the back foot towards midwicket
slower ball this time, on off stump, Maharoof gets behind the line and blocks
Sachin tosses up a slow one to end the over, Maharoof watchfully plays it back to him
fullish ball on middle and leg stump, driven down to long on for a single
lovely ball, going straight through, Maharoof played for the turn and the doosra skids past the outside edge
defended on the leg side on the front foot
full, fast on middle stump, Maharoof gets forward and blocks
tight line and length again on off and middle stump, Maharoof defends back to Harbhajan
Maharoof misses the sweep and gets hit on the pad outside off stump
tucked off the pads behind square for one
defended to midwicket on the front foot, that was bowled much faster
fired in quick again but the line is poor, down leg side, Maharoof gets a bit of pad on it and collects four leg byes to the fine leg fence
defended to midwicket on the back foot
dropped slightly short on off and middle, Maharoof goes back  and drives to long-on for one
Sangakkara pushes it to midwicket with soft hands to retain strike
Kumble begins with a  short ball and Sangakkara lofts it over midwicket to Munaf Patel in the deep, he fields it cleanly, no I'm joking, he  actually fumbled it again
played to fine leg for a single, too short from Kumble
defended to covers on the front foot
forced through midwicket on the back foot, Sangakkara is keen on the second and they get it easily to bring up the 200
fullish ball on middle and leg, driven to long-on for one more
full toss on off stump, Sangakkara leans forward and drives to cover
drifting on to the pads once more, flicked to deep square leg where Munaf fields it cleanly this time, no kidding
superb strike, he just took a couple of steps down the pitch and lofted it with the turn effortlessly over the midwicket fence, outstanding timing
defended to midwicket
flicked off the pads to Sreesanth at fine leg
tossed up delivery on leg and middle, Sangakkara tries to sweep but misses
Maharoof swings it through midwicket where Tendulkar has protection in the deep
full ball on middle and leg, Maharoof comes down the pitch and drives hard at Kumble, excellent bit of fielding saves runs
the flipper on off stump, Maharoof forces it to cover
driven firmly to Karthik on the long-on fence
Kumble drifts on to middle stump and Sangakkara tries to sweep but doesn't make contact
smack! Sangakkara steps down to Kumble and hits it hard and flat, that was hit so powerfully that long on had no chance
driven to long on for just the single this time
short of a length ball on leg and middle, Sangakkara clips it off his pads to Sreesanth at deep square leg
low full toss on middle and leg stump, pushed down to long on for one more
Sangakkara steps down the pitch and Munaf drops it a little shorter, defended back to the bowler
driven hard back at the bowler and Munaf drops a difficult chance, that was hit really hard and Munaf got both hands to it but couldn't hold on
sublime shot, Sangakkara goes down on one knee and cuts hard to the point fence
dropped slightly shorter, swung away to deep midwicket for a single, Sangakkara is on 96
mis-hit and it falls safe, Sangakkara got under that one and ended up scooping it down the ground, it fell it front of long off
smashed hard down to long-on by Maharoof, Kumble dragged that very short and Maharoof flat-batted it down the ground
Sangakkara reaches hundred in style! He picked the length early from Kumble and smashed it over deep midwicket, Munaf Patel couldn't get close to it
Maharoof this time, gets down on one knee and hammers a full toss from Kumble over the deep midwicket fence
fired into the pads from round the wicket, Maharoof plays it to midwicket for  a single, 16 runs off that over
Munaf fires it into the blockhole, Maharoof tries to smash it down the ground but can only play it back to the bowler
Munaf nearly finds the blockhole again, Maharoof aims to blast it through the off side but gets an inside edge through midwicket

massive massive hit, Munaf drops it a little fuller, Sangakkara stands his ground, moves his front leg out of the way and smashes it over the long-on fence, actually that was close to clearing the ground
he goes for it again but fails! Sangakkara didn't get enough power behind that shot and it flew to Sehwag who ran in from long on and dived to his left to take a well-judged catch

Maharoof holes out this time, he smashes that straight to Karthik at long on who takes a simple catch, he couldn't get under the ball to get the necessary elevation and skied it,  Munaf is on a hat-trick
driven to long off for a single to end the over
played to deep square leg for a single, Sreesanth fires the throw in from the deep
low full toss on middle and leg, driven to Karthik at long on where a fumble allows the second
fired into the pads, the batsman tries to hit through square leg but the ball hits the pad for leg byes on the off side
pushed to Karthik at long on for one more
fired into the blockhole yet again, driven to Karthik yet again for another single
Karthik is a busy man in this over, Bandara drives another flat and fast ball to long on

inn2.comm: a loosener from Malinga which goes way off target down the leg side
on target this time, good length on middle, defended back to the bowler
good length on middle stump and turned away towards the leg side for a couple, saved at the boundary
straying towards the body again and that was easy meat for Uthappa who turned his wrists and glanced it towards fine-leg
streaky! fullish on off stump, gets the outside edge and it races past second slip
drops it full again and Ganguly gets his bat behind it, gently dabs it towards mid-off
Uthappa gets another gift on the pads and he obliges, turning it away past square leg, the timing was the hall mark of that stroke
short of a length on middle and leg, Ganguly tries to turn it towards the on side but isnt quick enough
similar line and length and Ganguly waits on it and picks the gap between midwicket and mid-on

caught on the bounce! short on off stump and climbing on the batsman, Uthappa goes forward instead of staying back, the ball hits the tip of the bat and headsto Jayawardene at first slip who leaps and takes it with both hands
a little too much width and Dravid throws his bat at it, poor delivery and poor shot
width offered outside off again but he connects this time as the ball races past point, not the most attractive stroke but four anyway
this one swings in and catches Dravid unawares, good comeback by Maharoof
Maharoof bowls this one wide and Dravid isn't tempted to chase that,, left alone
good length on middle and off stump, defended to cover off the back-foot
just a little shorter, Ganguly rocks back and steers it past cover, who dives and cuts some pace off it
good length outside off stump, Dravid gets his bat down and defends in the 'v'
similar length, comes in just a little and Dravid pushes it back to the bowler
good length on middle and leg, Dravid glances it square
Malinga not adjusting well to the left-hand right hand combination, slips that one down leg
pull to finish that over! Malinga digs it in on the leg stump line, Ganguly rocks back and pulls it over square leg, didn't look very controlled but effective all the same
back of a length and defended back to the bowler

Maharoof strikes again! short of a length outside off and darting in after pitching, Dravid wasn't expecting that deviation and ended up inside edging it onto the bails, cracker of a delivery to get the Indian captain
short of a length in the channel outside off stump, left alone
fraction fuller, draws Tendulkar forward, pushed towards mid-on
just  a little width offered, Tendulkar goes for the cut but doesnt get his bat down properly as the ball goes through to the 'keeper
Maharoof errs in line outside off, the away movement didn't help his cause either
better line, closer to the batsman, left alone
good length on off stump, defended towards the off side
drops this a little fuller, Ganguly leans forward and steers it to the packed off side field
similar delivery, similar pace, Ganguly decides to stay on the back-foot, plays it to cover
he finds the gap with perfection! in the slot to drive and the ball flies past the covers
adjusts his line towrds the batsman's body, tucked off the hips but straight to square leg
defended towards the off side
this one crept a little low, fullish on off stump and Tendulkar gets an underedge onto his pads
Maharoof strays wide outside off stump
width offered and Tendulkar punches it in the gap wide of point for a single
good length ball on off stump, played back to the bowler
Maharoof drifts towards the body and Ganguly tucks it away with ease towards fine-leg
drops it just a touch fuller, Tendulkar gets forward, opens the face and glides it to third man, despairing dive by malinga
left alone to the 'keeper, Maharoof sticking to a shortish length, like Sreesanth did
Fullish on off stump, Ganguly gets forward and pushes it towards mid-on
fullish again, this time played back to the bowler
tip and run, Ganguly plays it down with soft hands towards mid-off and takes off immediately, the fielder hits the stumps but Ganguly was too quick for him
width outside off and Tendulkar opens the face at the last second and steers it past point
driven on the up towards Dilshan and he fails to take it, the ball did carry though, missed opportunity for Sri Lanka!
defended on the front foot towards cover

short of a length on the hips, Ganguly flicks it with ease, the fielder tries to kick it away as the ball approaches the ropes, unfortunately though his foot was touching the rope as he makes contact with the ball
defended off the backfoot back to the bowler
slower ball, angling away from him Ganguly waits and steers it comfortably towards third man
fuller in length on off stump and Tendulkar plays a solid front-foot defensive shot
well timed but not enough to reach the fence, ball drifts towards the body, Tendulkar plays with an angled bat and turns it wide of midwicket
short of a length and defended safely back to the bowler
good length oustide off, Tendulkar closes the face of the bat and works it to the on-side
similar delivery, Tendulkar shows the full face and defends back to the bowler
just a fraction full and Tendulkar drives on the front foot, doesnt quite get the desired placement past mid-off
flicked away past midwicket, Kulasekara makes the mistake of drifting towards the pads
glorious! this time the off side fielders are tested, full and wide outside off, Tendulkar leans onto it and languidly drives past point
better line, Tendulkar defends it back to the bowler
stump-to-stump, nice line from Malinga to begin with, no room to cut or pull, defended back
similar length, angling away after pitching, defended to mid-off
attempted yorker and Ganguly digs it off his toes, just manages to get his high backlift down on time
another attempted yorker but Tendulkar flicks it with ease and finds the square leg fence
unstoppable! Malinga tries to overcompensate by pitching it up but Tendulkar was quick to the task, turns his wrists and the ball races past midwicket
better line, on off stump this time and Tendulkar defends
just a fraction short of a length, Tendulkar stays on the backfoot and steers to point
drifts on the pads, Ganguly turns his wrists but doesnt time it well, midwicket does the fielding
smashed past the bowler, Ganguly gives himself a bit of room, was in the slot and the ball races past the bowler on his followthrough
defended back to the bowler
slightly short on the leg side, tucked towards the on-side
Low full toss outside off, dug out to point, bowler lucky to get away with that
another low full toss outside off, Ganguly doesnt get his bat down in time, Kulasekara lucky again
short and wide down leg,
good line outside off, defended on the backfoot
similar length, outside off just a touch, defended to point
good length outside off stump, Tendulkar opens the face but hits straight to cover
just a little wide and Tendulkar shows his class as he plays a punch drive past backward point, it was all about the timing
pitched on off stump, Tendulkar works it towards the on-side, the sweeper cuts it off
pacy low full toss, Ganguly doesnt get the desired timing but places it well enough past mid-on to steal a single
gentle pace outside off and defended back to the bowler
poor ball and equally poor shot, wide outside off and Ganguly ends up chasing at it, hit to cover
defended back the bowler
gives him the charge but gets the underedge as the ball goes towards fine-leg
good length on the stumps, Tendulkar uses his wrists and flicks it towards midwicket
width offered outside off stump and Ganguly plays away from his body, the desired placement wasn't there, fielded at mid-off
good line, cramping him for room, dedended back to the bowler
through point and superb timing again, just a little short and Tendulkar opens the face, the ball flies past a diving point off the first bounce
fine leg is up and Tendulkar makes hay! full and on the pads, Tendulkar turns his wrists at the last second
better line and defended off the backfoot
slower ball outside off, Tendulkar tries to hit it but the ball rebounds off the keeper
it's Ganguly's turn to exploit the leg-side gap, another full ball on the pads, Ganguly flicks it to the right of short fine leg, no point chasing that
fullish ball on off stump, Tendulkar gets down on one knee and drives wide of the man at mid-off
short of a length outside off stump, Ganguly waits for it on the back foor as it angles away from him, he plays it late down to third man
good length ball on off and middle stump, defended back to the bowler on the front foot
good length ball on off and middle, Tendulkar moves across and closes the face to play it to midwicket
tight line and length on off and middle, Tendulkar waits on the back foot and blocks
short of  a length ball just outside off stump, Tendulkar jumps on the back foot and opens the face to play it to point, Maharoof finishes a tight over, just two runs off it
bowled flat on off and middle stump, Ganguly gets forward and defends
flat ball again and much shorter, Ganguly gets on the back foot and turns the ball to square leg
on the shorter side once more, outside off stump, Tendulkar cuts to the man in the deep
bowled a little slower through the air on middle and leg, Ganguly moves across and plays the ball to short fine leg for a single
pushed through quicker on middle and leg, Tendulkar plays it to short fine leg
pushed to covers on the back foot for the fourth single in the over
full ball outside off stump, Tendulkar runs it off the face of the bat down to third man
good length ball angling across Ganguly from over the wicket, he gets forward and defends back to the bowler
Kulasekara bowls that on a tight length outside off stump, Ganguly plays it to point on the back foot
poor ball, that was the attempted slower ball but it was well outside off stump
full ball outside off stump, Ganguly squeezes it out towards cover
short of a alength ball outside off stump, Ganguly gets half forward and defends towards covers
in the blockhole outside off stump, Ganguly digs in out on the off side
driven to deep point for a single
good length delivery on middle and off, defended on the front foot
tossed up on off stump, a fraction too full and Ganguly gets forward and drives down the ground to long off
played with an angled bat behind point for  a single
dropped short outside off stump, Ganguly has ample time to move back and cut to the man at deep point, he fumbles but the batsmen settle for the single
bowled flat on off stump, Tendulkar defends to cover on the front foot
Kulasekara bounces Ganguly who hardly makes an effort to duck, he merely moved outside the line
Kulasekara was looking to hit the blockhole but bowled it full outside off stump, Ganguly drives to cover on the front foot
short of a length ball on off stump, a touch slower from Kulasekara, Ganguly tries to play it in front of point but Dilshan is across in a flash to prevent the single
full ball on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for a single
fullish length just outside off stump, Tendulkar gets a long way across and tries to force it to midwicket, he doesn't beat the in field
nearly in the blockhole this time, Tendulkar gets forward and drives to mid-off, he didn't time that well at all
bowled flat on middle and off stump, defended back to the bowler
defended on the front foot, that was bowled slower through the air and Ganguly got a thick inside edge that hit the pad and rolled to Sangakkara
defended to covers on the front foot
drifting on to middle and leg, Ganguly plays back and works it through square leg for one
tossed up on middle and off, Tendulkar moves forward and makes room, he lofts it inside out over extra cover, he hasn't timed it well, if he had it would have gone straight to the man on the fence
Ganguly tries to sweep a full ball down leg side, he misses and the ball hits the pad
short and wide outside off stump, Tendulkar reaches out for it and runs it down to third man, he brings up his 76th ODI fifty, he was dropped early on and is now making Sri Lanka pay
Ganguly tries to heave it through midwicket but gets an inside edge to deep square leg
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Ganguly tries to cut but gets beaten
this time he connects with the cut short and collects a single to third man
driven to covers on the front foot
in the blockhole outside off stump, Tendulkar opens the face and plays it to third man
tossed up on middle and off stump, Tendulkar backs away again and smashes it to deep cover, he's aiming for the extra cover region
drilled down to long on for a single, Ganguly used his feet well against the extra flight
Tendulkar takes a steps down and Bandara fires it at the pads, played to short fine leg
reverse-swept from middle and leg stump to short third man, Tendulkar looks a little restless all of a sudden
driven on the up to covers
full toss on off stump, Tendulkar stands his ground and pushes it to deep cover for a single
full ball on off stump, Tendulkar drives to long off for one more
fullish length on leg and middle stump, Ganguly puses it wide of the man at mid-on, Jayasuriya gives chase and keeps them to two
another ball on the pads, Ganguly works it through square leg and moves on to 49
full ball on the padds, Tendulkar tries to flick but doesn't make contact, the ball hits the pads for leg byes to fine leg
driven to covers on the front foot, the crowd waits in anticipation for the fifty
Rajkot erupts, full on off stump, Ganguly eases it through covers on the front foot to bring up his fifty
full ball on leg stump, Ganguly tries to sweep but the ball hits the pad for a leg bye to short fine leg, that also brings up the 100 partnership

bowled flat and fast outside off stump, Tendulkar came down the pitch, realised that he wasn't to the pitch of the ball and tried to fend it away, he was beaten and Sangakkara whipped off the bails in a trice, huge wicket for Sri Lanka
defended on the front foot to the offside
dabbed to point on the front foot for a single
bowled flat on off stump, it was the googly that spun away from Ganguly, he dabs it to point for  a sharp single
Sehwag tires to drive on the off side but inside edges it on to pad
full ball outside off stump, Ganguly drives and drives well through covers, Jayawardene has two men in the deep on the off side
fullish ball once again on off stump, Ganguly leans forward and drives to mid-off
Ganguly dabs it straight to Dilshan at point and sets off for the single, he quickly realised it was a terrible idea and sent Sehwag back, Sehwag got in the way of the throw to the bowler's end
driven to cover on the front foot
full and wide outside off stump, Ganguly drives through cover point for a single
superb yorker from Kulasekara, it had Sehwag hopping all over the place, the Sri Lankans go up in appeal for lbw but the umpire is unmoved, perhaps he got a bit of bat on it
starts off with a no ball, Ganguly bottom-edges a short and wide one towards short third man
full and fast, searching for the blockhole, Sehwag throws his bat at it and gets an inside edge to short fine leg, he's very lucky that missed the stumps
Malinga fires in another blockhole ball, Sehwag chops down on it and squeezes it to point
another yorker has Sehwag hopping and falling about his crease, Malinga roars an appeal but the impact on the pad was taking it past leg stump
anothet no-ball and another one sears into the blockhole, Sehwag plays this one better and defends to covers
he searches for a blockhole again but ends up bowling it full on the pads, Sehwag clips it to deep square leg for two runs
sublime timing, Sehwag eases on the front foot and times the drive past mid-off to perfection, lovely timing + fast outfield = four
full ball searching for the blockhole, dug out to mid-off on the front foot
driven firmly into the covers where Jayawardene dives to his left to save several runs
Ganguly goes high and far, Kulasekara bowls that far too full, Ganguly uses the bottom hand to get under it and loft it over the long-off boundary
forced through midwicket for another single
Kulasekara searches for the blockhole and Sehwag drives to cover
they are finding the blockhole very regularly, Sehwag just about manages to get his bat down in time
Kulasekara tries for another yorker but gets this one horribly wrong, it ends up as a full toss on the pads, Sehwag clips it fine of the man at short fine leg

Ganguly gifts his wicket! Malinga bowls a full and wide ball, Ganguly doesn't move his feet but reaches out for it, the ball bounces just before hitting the bat and Sangakkara takes a simple catch, that's a soft dismissal to end a fine innings
bowled off a no-ball! Malinga fires in the perfect yorker and Dhoni plays all around it, 147.4kmh and crashes into the stumps, Dhoni was walking off but then spots Simon Taufel signalling a no-ball
another yorker, another no ball, this time Dhoni plays it to square leg for a single
Malinga foxes Sehwag with a slower ball, 125 kmh, he reaches out for it and spoons it towards point, the ball falls a few feet short of the fielder
Malinga unleashes another fierce delivery, it hits Sehwag just above the pad and he's in a bit of pain
defended to midwicket on the frotn foot, that was marginally slower at 146kmh
Malinga is finding the blockhole at will, Dhoni is prepared this time and defends back to the bowler
slower ball nearly in the blockhole to end the over, Dhoni pokes at it and gets a thick edge to third man
good length ball slanting into middle and leg. Dhoni pushes forward and defends
in a tight channel outside off stump, Dhoni stays rooted to his crease and pushes forward, he gets beaten
full ball outside leg stump, Dhoni leans across and plays it through square leg
good length ball on off stump, not giving Sehwag any room, he moves forward and defends to the off side
fullish ball on the pads, worked behind square for one more
pitches outside off stump and holds its line, Dhoni's feet as stationary as he reaches out for it, the ball beats the outside edge
lands outside off stump, Sehwag delicately dabs it to third man with an open face
steered towards deep midwicket comfortably
tossed up on the pads, ball lobs up and the bowler appeals for a bat-pad
given room to cut and Sehwag finds the gap wide of point
Bandara strikes back! fired in outside off stump, Sehwag attempted another dab, was cramped for room and ended up getting a thickish outside edge
driven to covers
tossed up on middle and leg and Karthik turns it to midwicket
inside out shot and Karthik plays it to the off side
another unconvincing shot, Karthik steps down to a fullish delivery and gets a leading edge, ball rolls to the off side
shorter, Dhoni gets on the backfoot and slaps it down to long-on
driven on the front foot to long off
slips down the leg side
driven hard and brilliantly fielded by short cover
fullish and Karthik gets to the pitch of it and turns it away towards midwickt
comes forward, gets hit on the pads, loud appeal,an inside edge saves him
turned away towards the on side
tossed up on off and middle, gets forward, opens the face and steers it towards point
shorter, Karthik rocks back and cuts it to point
drifting on the pads, Karthik gets down on his knees and sweeps square
gets forward and drives it to long on
sweeps, ball strikes the pad and a confident appeal follows, batsman was well forward
another flat-batted slap down to long-on to end the over
tossed up on off, Dhoni stretches forward and dabs to the off side and sets off for a quick single
driven forcefully on the front foot and stopped brilliantly at short cover
slightly shorter, Karthik cover drives and picks up an easy run
cut towards cover
slightly short and cut away, batsmen think of a second run but decide against it
left alone to the keeper
left alone again
drifting down leg and steered towards midwicket
fullish on off stump, steered to point
tossed up on middle and leg, Dhoni steps down a few paces and turns it to the on-side, gets the placement wrong
short of a length and Dhoni hits it off the backfoot against the turn, misfield allows another run
hit to short cover and another good piece of fielding
driven to long-on
short and wide, turning away, cut towards point
flatter delivery on the leg stump, defended on the front-foot
tossed up on off stump and Karthik gets to the pitch of it and steers it towards midwicket
full toss, swept square, the crowd anticipate a boundary but the square leg fielder gets to it easily
full and swept away again
Karthik survives a run-out! Dhoni sends him back after they contemplate a single, Karthik just manages to get his bat in and beat the direct hit
turned away towards deep square leg for a single
fullish, Dhoni steps down and steers it on the full towards midwicket
flatter, outside off, Dhoni drives with the turn towards long-off
flat again, Dhoni gets forward and defends back to the bowler
fullish, driven to cover, the batsman didn't get the timing right there
tossed outside off, Karthik walks across and stumps and turns it to the on-side
tossed on leg, turned to deep midwicket, second run turned down
slightly short, Karthik whips it to the on side and they pick up two easily
pushed in faster on leg stump, defended to the bowler
fullish on leg stump, Karthik steps down and chips it forcefully over midwicket
steps down and defended
on the blockhole on leg and Dhoni digs it out
aims for the blockhole again! this time its a low full toss and Karthik pushed it back to the bowler
yorker length outside off stump, Karthik stretches, gets enough bat on it to piece the off side field
fullish on leg this time, worked off the wrists to square leg
full again, tjhis time on middle and the batsman chips it towards mid-on
short and down leg, Malinga striving for that extra yard of pace, gets his direction wrong
full on middle, worked towards long-on
fullish ball on off and middle stump, Dhoni gets his front foot across and works it wide of mid-on for one
dropped short outside off stump, Karthik goes back and cuts past point for another single
played with soft hands to midwicket, they run a very cheeky single, the throw to the  bowler's end is poor and the batsmen run an overthrow
cut behind point for one more
quick single taken to midwicket, these two are super quick between the wickets, that's the 50 partnership, 41 singles in it
worked off the pads behind square leg for one more
short and wide outside the off stump, Dhoni has plenty of room to free his arms and cut to deep point for a single
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Karthik drives lazily at it and gets beaten outside the off stump
slower ball outside off stump, Karthik waits for it and runs it off the face to third man
short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni moves forward and plays it to point
width offered outside off stump, Dhoni slaps it off the back foot to deep cover
once again Karthik gets beaten outside the off stump, perhaps a lapse in concentration for his last two attempted drives have been lazy shots
dabbed to point on the front foot for a single
bowled flat and fast on off and middle, Karthik drives on the back foot to Jayasuriya who lets it go through his legs for a single
defended to covers on the front foot
turned off the pads behind square on the leg side for a single
full ball on off stump, Karthik tries to close the face of the bat and play it through midwicket, he gets a leading edge through cover point for one
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
hits a good length and line outside off stump, Karthik waits for it and guides it down to third man for a single, the target is ticking down steadily
just short of a length outside off stump, Dhoni makes room and hits it off the back foot through covers for one

Kulasekara saves a certain boundary on the third man fence, Karthik lashed out at that outside the off stump and got a thick outside edge down to third man, Kulasekara was ever so quick in getting into the right position to dive
driven to mid-off on the front foot
slower ball on off stump, Karthik gets forward and opens the face to play it to point
driven on the up to mid-off who is in the circle but deep enough for the batsmen to scamper the single, the throw is wild and Sangakkara runs towards short fine leg to prevent the overthrow
bowled flat and short on middle and off stump, Karthik moves back and towards leg stump to drive through covers for a single
full and fast on middle stump, Dhoni presses forward and defends towards cover
a touch slower through the air, Dhoni drives and takes a single to mid-on who is inside the circle
defended back to the bowler on the front foot, that was pushed flat and quick through the air because Karthik showed intent of stepping down
defended towards point on the front foot
full ball on off stump, Karthik moves forward and pushes it towards point
he fires in a short ball to Dhoni who sways out of the way, he's hardly bowled any bouncers today
and the yorker follows the bouncer! Dhoni just about keeps it out and the ball flies off the edge to third man, that reverse-swung a long way back into Dhoni
outstanding bouncer, Karthik sways out of the way and the ball follows him, that was very well directed

the yorker gets him! Superb ball to follow the bouncer, it swings back into Karthik who tries to hit it on the leg side, he gets beaten and the ball hits the pad in front of middle and leg, was that missing leg? It looked close enough
a searing yorker beats Harbhajan for sheer pace, how did that miss off stump? It was ever so close
another attempted yorker but it finishes as a full toss on off stump, Harbhajan pushes it through covers for one
bowled flat and fast on middle stump, defended to midwicket
bowled from wide off the crease on middle stump, defended on the front foot
beaten outside the off stump, three dot balls, the pressure mounts
worked through square leg for a single
driven firmly down the ground for two runs
dabbed in front of midwicket for a single to finish the over, Dhoni retains strike
fullish ball on off stump, Dhoni gets forward and drives to cover
full ball outside off stump, Dhoni hammers it down the ground but gets just the single

caught! and what a catch! Harbhajan throws all he has behind a heave that was intended to go down the ground, instead he gets a top edge that swirls high in the region towards third man, Jayawardene runs back and dives to his left to take a high-pressure catch
slammed down to long off for a single, Kumble will be on strike
Kumble moves across his stumps and pushes the ball into the vacant midwicket area for a single
full ball outside the off stump, Dhoni reaches out and drives to Jayasuriya at cover, one run and Dhoni retains strike
Malinga looks for the blockhole first up, Dhoni drives down the ground looking for two runs, he will have to settle for one
another one nearly in the blockhole, very difficult to hit no matter who you are, Kumble digs it out to cover
full toss on leg stump, Kumble misses out by hitting it straight to midwicket, Dhoni looks on helpless from the non-striker's end
another full and fast ball, Kumble hits it to mid-off desperate to get off strike, Dhoni sends him back for there was no single in it
full ball on off stump, Kumble makes room and frees his arms, he square drives it inside out to deep cover
driven hard into the ground and down to long off for a single, excellent death bowling this, everything in the blockhole, nothing for the batsmen to work with

Dhoni hammers it down the ground and sets off for two runs, there was never two in it and Kumble was stranded hopelessly when the throw came in from long-on, from India's point of view Dhoni retains the strike
fired flat and fast into the blockhole,. Dhoni tries to heave it on the leg side but misses
driven straight to cover, Dhoni declines the single
Dhoni hammers it straight down the ground and that's hit straight enough to beat the diving Maharoof, that was hit very hard

stunning, simply stunning, Dhoni had room to free his arms and he smashed that  high over cover, Maharoof ran back looking over his head, running at full speed, Upul Tharanga was running in from the fence also at full speed, there was danger of a collision but Maharoof didn't lose focus, he kept his eye on the ball and completed an outstanding catch running backwards and tumbling to the ground, one of the best catches you will see under pressure

Sri Lanka have won!! They've Jayasuriya fires it flat and fast wide outside off stump, Sreesanth steps down the track but doesn;t make contact, he looks at the umpire  expecting it to be called a wide but Simon Taufel hands Jayasuriya his cap and says that's the end of the game
